ui.panel.lovelace.cards.actions.no_url: Engin vefslóð til að opna tilgreint
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.empty_state.no_d: Þessi síða leyfir þér að stjórna tækjunum þínum, hinsvegar lýtur út fyrir að þú sért ekki með nein tæki uppsett sem stendur. Farðu yfir á samþættingarsíðu til að byrja.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.iframe.error_sec: Unable to load iframes pointing at websites using {target_protocol} if Home Assistant is served over {context_protocol}.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.recovery-mode.de: Home Assistant ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in recovery mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.starting.descrip: Home Assistant er að ræsast, bíddu aðeins...
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.no_data: Það eru engin gögn til að sýna. Það geta tekið allt að 2 klukkustundir fyrir ný gögn að berast eftir að þú stillir orkumælaborðið þitt.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.no_data_p: Það eru engin gögn fyrir þetta tímabil.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.solar_con: This card indicates how much of the solar energy you produced was used by your home instead of being returned to the grid.
If this number is typically very low, indicating excess solar production, you might want to consider charging a home battery or electric car from your solar panels at times of high solar production.
Þú hefur ekki framleitt neina sólarorku
Ekki tókst að reikna út eigin neyslu á sólarorku
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.self_suff: This card indicates how much of the energy consumed by your home came from on-site sources (such as solar panels or batteries).
Ekki var hægt að reikna sjálfbærni
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.grid_neut: Þetta kort gefur til kynna nettó orkunotkun þína.
Ef nálin er í fjólubláu, skilaðir þú meiri orku í kerfið en þú neyttir af því. Ef það er í bláu, þá nýttir þú meiri orku frá kerfinu en þú skilaðir.
Grid neutrality could not be calculated
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.carbon_co: Þetta spjald gefur til kynna hversu mikið af orkunni sem heimili þitt notaði var framleitt með eldsneyti sem ekki er jarðefnaeldsneyti eins og sól, vindur og kjarnorka. Því hærra, því betra!
Ekki er hægt að reikna notkun á grænni orku

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.hea: Taka yfir stjórn á Lovelace viðmótinu
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.par: Þessu mælaborði er nú viðhaldið af Home Assistant. Það er sjálfkrafa uppfært þegar nýjar einingar eða mælaborðsíhlutir verða tiltækir. Ef þú tekur stjórnina verður þetta mælaborð ekki lengur uppfært sjálfkrafa. Þú getur alltaf búið til nýtt mælaborð í stillingum til að leika þér með.
Ertu viss um að þú viljir taka yfir stjórn á notendaviðmótinu þínu?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.yam: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your dashboard config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your dashboard configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_no: This element doesn't have an ID. Please add an ID to this element in 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_mi: Home Assistant can add IDs to all your cards and views automatically for you by pressing the 'Migrate configuration' button.

The condition can not be tested because the configuration is not valid.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.alarm-pane: The Alarm panel card allows you to arm and disarm your alarm control panel integrations.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.name: Svæði
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.descr: Svæðisspjaldið birtir sjálfkrafa einingar á tilteknu svæði.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.calendar.d: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week, and list views
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.conditiona: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.d: Einingaspjaldið er almennt spjald sem flokkar hluti saman í lista.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.e: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity.des: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity's state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.des: Takkaspjaldið gerir þér kleift að bæta við tökkum til að framkvæma aðgerðir.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.def: The default depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info dialog will be shown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity-fil: The Entity filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.name: Mælir
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.desc: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.glance.des: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.name: Grid
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.descr: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.title: Title
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.logbook.de: Skráningarsöguspjaldið sýnir lista yfir atburði eininga.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.history-gr: Söguspjaldið gerir þér kleift að birta línurit fyrir skráðar einingar.
Extend Y axis limits to fit data
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.statistics: The Statistics graph card allows you to display a graph of the statistics for each of the entities listed.
Tölfræðikortið sýnir þér tölfræði fyrir einingar á völdu tímabili
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.horizontal: Lárétta staflaspjaldið gerir þér kleift að stafla saman mörgum spjöldum, þannig að þau sitja alltaf við hliðina á hvort öðru í einum dálki.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.humidifier: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.
Show current humidity as primary information
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.iframe.des: Vefsíðuspjaldið gerir þér kleift að fella uppáhalds vefsíðuna þína inn í Home Assistant.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.name: Ljós
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.desc: Ljósaspjaldið gerir þér kleift að breyta birtustigi ljóss.

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.heading.de: The heading card structures your dashboard by providing title, icon and navigation.

ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.name: Kort
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.descri: Kortaspjaldið sem gerir þér kleift að sýna einingar á korti.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.markdown.d: Markdown spjaldið er notað til að birta Markdown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.media-cont: The Media control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture.de: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to perform an action.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-el: The Picture elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.
Are you sure you want to delete the {type} element?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-en: The Picture entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-gl: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to perform an action.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.plant-stat: Staða plöntu kortið er fyrir alla grasafræðingana þarna úti.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.sensor.des: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.
The to-do list card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your to-do list.
This card requires the `todo` integration to be set up.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.thermostat: Hitastillikortið gefur þér möguleika á að stjórna loftslagseiningu. Leyfir þér að breyta hitastigi og ham einingar.
Show current temperature as primary information
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.name: Flís
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.descr: The tile card gives you a quick overview of your entity. The card allow you to toggle the entity, show the more info dialog or custom actions.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.color: Inactive state (e.g. off, closed) will not be colored.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.vertical-s: The Vertical stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.weather-fo: The Weather forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.badge.entity.de: The Entity badge gives you a quick overview of your entity.
